name: A Dance with Daema
description: Play as Eli and guide him through crucial decisions that will determine his fate. He begins his encounter with Daema at a local bar. The bartender, Marcus, tries to assist Eli in charming Daema. Eli and Daema eventually make it to the dance floor when the fling takes a dark turn. Eli must choose to embrace Daema or run for his life. Take your pick.
